value.string:
REQUEST = context.REQUEST
 language = context.getPortalObject().Localizer.get_selected_language()
 module = context.getDefaultModule('Credential Request')
 username = reference
 organisation_title = career_subordination_title
 document = module.newContent(portal_type='Credential Request',
 first_name=first_name,
 last_name=last_name,
 reference=username,
 organisation_title=organisation_title,
 default_email_text=default_email_text,
 default_telephone_text=default_telephone_text,
 default_address_street_address=default_address_street_address,
 default_address_city=default_address_city,
 default_address_zip_code=default_address_zip_code,
 language=language,
 role="client",
 function="customer",
 )
 
 if not password in ["", None] and len(password.replace(' ','')) > 0:
 document.setPassword(password)
 
 if context.getPortalType() in ["Web Site", "Web Section"]:
 notification_reference = context.getLayoutProperty('layout_subscription_notification_reference',
 'vifib-subscription.notification')
 else:
 notification_reference = 'vifib-subscription.notification'
 
 context_url = context.absolute_url()
 
 # Send email to subscriber in activities.
 document.activate(activity='SQLQueue').CredentialRequest_sendSubscriptionNotificationForNewUser(
 context_url=context_url,
 notification_reference=notification_reference)
 
 # Redirect to subscription accepted reference or by default, to home with message
 message_text = "Thanks for your registration. You will be receive an email to activate your account."
 message = "view?portal_status_message=" + context.Base_translateString(message_text)
 redirect_url = '%s/%s' % (REQUEST.get('current_web_site', context).absolute_url(),message)
 return REQUEST.RESPONSE.redirect(redirect_url)
